sect2.title: Installation of tcpwrappers
sect2.para: Install tcpwrappers with the following commands:

screen.userinput: patch -Np1 -i ../tcp_wrappers_7.6.diff && make REAL_DAEMON_DIR=/usr/sbin linux && cp libwrap.a /usr/lib && cp tcpd.h /usr/include && cp safe_finger /usr/sbin && cp tcpd /usr/sbin && cp tcpdchk /usr/sbin && cp tcpdmatch /usr/sbin && cp try-from /usr/sbin && cp -av *.3 /usr/share/man/man3 && cp -av *.5 /usr/share/man/man5 && cp -av *.8 /usr/share/man/man8
